content.query:
USE [cdc-synapse]
GO

IF EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE [TABLE_SCHEMA] = 'Staging' AND [TABLE_NAME] = 'Orders') DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [Staging].[Orders]  
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Staging].[Orders]
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/orders',
	DATA_SOURCE = [STAGING],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFF]
)
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK '/output/year=*/month=*/day=*/hour=*/*.parquet',
                DATA_SOURCE='ORDERS_LANDING',
                FORMAT = 'PARQUET') AS [files]
WHERE OrderID IS NOT NULL
